message.content:
cs.IR, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.SI, cs.CL 

This paper focuses on the item cold-start problem in recommender systems, which is a common issue in information retrieval (IR) and machine learning (ML) applications. Therefore, cs.IR and cs.LG are the most likely sub-categories. The paper also proposes a novel recommendation scheme that leverages active learning and items' attribute information, which falls under the scope of artificial intelligence (AI) and social and information networks (SI). Finally, the paper uses collaborative filtering, which is a popular technique in natural language processing (NLP) and computational linguistics (CL). Therefore, cs.CL is also a possible sub-category.
